short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple extension enables pasting into multi-choice drowndown select form fields.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple extension enables pasting into multi-choice dropdown select form fields. Be sure to have the multi-choice select field highlighted (by using tab) but without the choices showing and then use ctrl+v to paste. It will automatically search the list of available options and match against your current clipboard content.
